name: Katekyo Hitman Reborn!: DS - Shinuki Max! Vongola Carnival!!
summary: Katekyo Hitman Reborn! DS - Shinuki Max! Vongola Carnival!! is a Japanese Nintendo DS game that was released on March 29, 2007. It is based on Akira Amano's manga series, Katekyo Hitman Reborn!. The game includes a variety of minigames that follow scenarios from the anime adaptation.
